item.title: Fairfax Wind Symphony
item.description: Background # I’ve been playing saxophone with the Fairfax Wind Symphony since the beginning of 2022 and eventually it came up that they needed a new person to administer the site.

item.title: Valley Heat Podcast
item.description: About # After getting into this podcast, I noticed it had no official website so I reached out to the creator and it turns out he was having a hard time getting the site to look the way he wanted with Wordpress.
